1. The Unaudited Standalone Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended on 31 December 2022.

2. The Unaudited Consolidated Financial Results of the Company for the quarter and nine months ended on 31 December 2022.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Outcome Of The Board Meeting Dated 10Th August 2022
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, the Board of Directors in its meeting held today, 10th August 2022, have, inter alia, considered and approved the following:

1. Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Result of the Company for the quarter ended June 30, 2022 along with Limited Review Report for Standalone and Consolidated Financial Result for the period ended 30th June, 2022, issued by M/s. H Tosniwal & Co., Chartered Accountants, Statutory Auditors of the company.

An extract of the aforementioned results will be published in the newspapers in accordance with the Listing Regulations.

data.caption: Regulation 23(9)-Disclosures Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended March 31, 2022
data.news_body: Pursuant to the requirement of Regulation 23(9) of SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we are submitting herewith disclosures of related party transactions for the half year ended March 31, 2022

data.caption: Results-Financial Results For The Quarter And Nine Months Ended 31-12-2021
data.news_body:
Pursuant to Regulation 33 of the SEBI (Listing Obligations and Disclosure Requirements) Regulations, 2015, we wish to inform you that the Board of Directors of the Company, in its meeting held on 27th January, 2022 have, inter alia, considered and approved the Un-audited Standalone and Consolidated Financial Result for the quarter and nine months ended 31st December, 2021.

A copy of the said results together with the Limited Review Report for Standalone and Consolidated Financial Result for the period ended 31st December, 2021, issued by Statutory Auditors of the company are enclosed herewith.

An extract of the aforementioned results will be published in the newspapers in accordance with the Listing Regulations.

Kindly take the same on your record.
